about_the_game:
Don the mantle of Phantoms' ancestors and awaken the dark powers of Nogir, a legendary dragon born from rituals designed to create the perfect guardian. No one knows the true strength of this mythical Dragon - but soon, they shall see…

The Skaltir Apostate Pack includes:
  • 1 Legendary Phantom Dragon
  • 1 Legendary Phantom Armour
  • 1 Legendary Phantom Shield
  • 1 Legendary Phantom Sword
  • 1 Legendary Player Icon
  • 1,000 Gems
detailed_description:
Don the mantle of Phantoms' ancestors and awaken the dark powers of Nogir, a legendary dragon born from rituals designed to create the perfect guardian. No one knows the true strength of this mythical Dragon - but soon, they shall see…

The Skaltir Apostate Pack includes:
  • 1 Legendary Phantom Dragon
  • 1 Legendary Phantom Armour
  • 1 Legendary Phantom Shield
  • 1 Legendary Phantom Sword
  • 1 Legendary Player Icon
  • 1,000 Gems

name: Century - Skältir Apostate Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6Ghz or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8Ghz or AMD Ryzen 5 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Don the mantle of Phantoms' ancestors and awaken the dark powers of Nogir, a legendary dragon born from rituals designed to create the perfect guardian. No one knows the true strength of this mythical Dragon - but soon, they shall see…
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, Japanese
